amendment.description: Amendment encourages Government Sponsored Enterprises (GSEs) to purchase personal property loans secured by manufactured housing that will count towards the GSE underserved market goals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-254 to permit personal property loans secured by manufactured housing to be considered in determining whether a GSE has met its duty to serve underserved markets and to permit manufactured homes that have not been attached to ground owned by a manufactured home owner to count towards this goal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carson amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
